de.hsb.ms.syn.common.util

Class AudioUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.util.AudioUtils

  • public abstract class AudioUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for specific audio things. It contains the generation algorithms for most Gen Nodes, for example
    Author:
    Marcel
